title: Report a bug with leaverbuster...
body:
So,,
My problem is i have 5 games leaverbuster. When I try to join a game the leaver buster starts to countdown from 20min,, after 5min or so I get attempting to reconnect (btw, I have internet connection but game tells me attempting to reconnect) so when the 20min finishes I don't go to loading game I just go back to lobby screen and I have to do the leaverbuster again, but the same thing happens and I can't play games anymore

Please help me as fast as you can,, this bug is killing me

replies.body:
An account can continue to receive an escalated duration and required games as it continues to leave games.   It's really important to get this fixed up to prevent further lower priority queues, but the issue seems to be persisting if you're getting stuck at attempting to reconnect.  

Your best bet here would be to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot whatever network issue that might be causing a disconnect from the game server.  Test it out in a custom game to be sure!
